General.Name: Shanghai International Airport Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai International Airport Co., Ltd. provides ground support services for domestic and foreign air transport companies and passengers in China. It offers long-distance passenger stations, parking lot management, and parking extension services, as well as freight forwarding, customs declaration, inspection, and other services. The company is also involved in the operating and leasing aviation business premises, commercial premises, and office premises, domestic trade; advertising management; air transport relevant business; inspection and customs declaration agent businesses. In addition, it engages in the operation of restaurants and hotels; air freight; and air logistics businesses. The company was founded in 1997 is headquartered in Shanghai, China. Shanghai International Airport Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shanghai Airport (Group) Co., Ltd.

3.Name: Mr. Ye  Huang
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
